meta-review.comment: Resident Evil 2 nails the balance between nostalgia and innovation. Capcom breathes new life into this survival horror classic, offering heart-pounding combat and spine-tingling exploration. While the lack of significant differences in the characters' stories may discourage repeat playthroughs, the initial experience sets a new standard for remakes. Whether you're a seasoned fan or a newcomer, this game provides a hair-raising journey through the dilapidated ruins of Raccoon City. Get ready to face your fears and survive the nightmare!
